[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-cache-worker/src/lib.rs] [Function: new()] [Configuration Cloning] When cloning configuration parameters, could there be reference issues or unsafe memory operations that lead to use-after-free or double-free vulnerabilities? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-cache-worker/src/lib.rs] [Function: run()] [Infinite Loop Risk] Does worker.run() properly handle connection failures and implement exponential backoff, or can repeated fast failures create an infinite panic-restart loop exhausting system resources? [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-cache-worker/src/lib.rs] [Function: run()] [Race Condition] When multiple threads or tasks call run() concurrently, can race conditions occur in Worker initialization leading to inconsistent cache state or double-processing of transactions? [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-cache-worker/src/lib.rs] [Function: run()] [Error Context Leak] Do the context() calls properly sanitize error messages to prevent leaking internal infrastructure details (Redis connection strings, file paths) that could aid attackers? (Low)
